QuestData.Title: A Cleansing Song
QuestData.Description: Earth in Sholazar is pure. The pillars have protected the land for centuries.$B$BWater, not as pure, it comes from outside Sholazar.... from oceans, from lakes, from rivers. Water sometimes bring bad spirits - need to be cleansed.$B$BYou take this chime and play at Bittertide Lake, Wintergrasp River and River's Heart. It make bad spirit angry... and then you must kill it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Soo-nee, at the Rainspeaker Canopy, wants you to play the Cleansing Chime at Bittertide Lake, Wintergrasp River and River's Heart and slay the evil spirits that plague the waters there.
QuestData.RewardText: Waters... cleansed. Yes. All is well.$b$bYou understand our way, $n.
